Description: Operates virtual health care equipment (national and international) for second medical consultations and educational activities with national and international medical centres.- Manages and operates virtual health care solutions, and related applications.- Installs virtual health care equipment for network projects.- Repairs and upgrade virtual health care equipment.- Trains virtual health care network users.- Develops and modifies virtual health care websites.- Assists in planning, developing and promoting the virtual health care application and media.Bachelor's Degree or Associate Degree/Diploma in Health Computer Science, Computer Information System or other related discipline is required.One (1) year of related experience with Bachelor's Degree, or three (3) years with Associate Degree/Diploma is required.- Saudi national only.- Medical terminology course is preferred.Job Details
